description: Women have also filmed themselves doing other physical activities in saris, including hula-hooping and skydiving. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Nine yards of freedom: Indian women take to running in saris to break taboos
title_page: Nine yards of freedom: Indian women take to running in saris to break taboos | The Straits Times
maintext:
NEW DELHI - Ms Meena Kanvinde is a fitness enthusiast. She loves running through Mumbai’s crowded streets at an easy pace. But for years, she has grappled with one conundrum – derisive stares from passers-by.
This is because she runs in a sari, the garment she is most comfortable in. Not body-hugging activewear she feels uneasy wearing.
